message:
I don't see anything in [the docs](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.net.http.httpclient.getstringasync) that would suggest that. You might want to read my [intro to async](https://blog.stephencleary.com/2012/02/async-and-await.html).

Specifically, the task isn't "running" at all because [there is no thread](https://blog.stephencleary.com/2013/11/there-is-no-thread.html). If the code used `ConfigureAwait(false)` and if the task completed asynchronously, then the code will not resume on the UI thread.
